wikitext.*:
{{Disambig-two|the chapter in [[Unfinished Tales]]|Istari (Wizards)|''[[Wizards]]''}}{{ut-chapters}}
'''The Istari''' is a chapter in [[Unfinished Tales]], a posthumously published work of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] edited and published by [[Christopher Tolkien]].

== Synopsis ==
In the section is described the background of the five wizards:
*[[Blue Wizards|Alatar]]
*[[Gandalf]]
*[[Saruman]]
*[[Blue Wizards|Pallando]]
*[[Radagast]]

The main focus however is on Gandalf and Saruman and specifically their names in the various languages of Middle-earth.

It is important to note that the section is a composition of various manuscripts and printed texts from [[The Silmarillion]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]] with comments by [[Christopher Tolkien]] rather than a singular document. In the notes some information on [[Queen Berúthiel]] is also disclosed. There is also a [[wilt thou learn the lore|poem]] about [[Dagor Dagorath]].
